input_output module¶

class input_output.input_data(filename, filedir)¶

Bases: object

Data object that handles reading in the data. :param filename: The filename of the input file. :type filename: string :param filedir: The directory containing the input file. :type filedir: string

check_read()¶

Method that determines if numpy array or pandas dataframe are to be read, based on the input file name. :returns: True if pandas dataframe is to be read; false if numpy array is to be read. :rtype: bool

read_in()¶

Reads in the data into an numpy array or pandas dataframe. :returns: Returns the data either in an array or dataframe. :rtype: numpy array/pandas dataframe

class input_output.output_data(data, indices, outdir, option, data2=0)¶

Bases: object

Data object that handles plotting and writing data. :param data: The data to be plotted/printed. :type data: numpy array/pandas dataframe :param indices: The column indices that remain if insignificant entries were skipped. :type indices: integer list :param option: The option that handles the output processing - choose from: expecval, MOpop, transdipmom, efield, aucofu. :type option: string :param data2: The additional data, if two sets of data are processed for that specific output option. :type data2: numpy array/pandas dataframe

plot0()¶

Expectation value output method. Generates plot - the specified output data is generated and saved to the corresponding file.

plot1()¶

MO populations output method. Generates data files and plot - the specified output data is generated and saved to the corresponding files.

plot2()¶

Transition dipole moment output method. Generates data files and plot - the specified output data is generated and saved to the corresponding files.

plot3()¶

Electric field output method. Generates data files and plot - the specified output data is generated and saved to the corresponding files.

plot4()¶

Autocorrelation function output method. Generates data files and plot - the specified output data is generated and saved to the corresponding files.

plot5()¶

Default output method - no output.

plotparams(myplot, strx, stry)¶

Method to define plotting parameters such as font size. :param myplot: Name of the figure object (typically ‘ax’). :type myplot: string :param strx: Name of the x axis label. :type strx: string :param stry: Name of the y axis label. :type stry: string
